name: Wiper Blade Refill, Beigaon 28 inch Silicone Wiper Blade Refill for Replacement Windshield Wipers, (Strip Height: 11mm, Width: 6mm) Fit for Frameless Wiper Insert, DIY Cut to Size(Pack of 2)
short_description: Greater Durability Save Your Money: The wiper blade strip is crafted from silicone material, making it softer and better suited to fit with your windshield. Proven to last up to 60% longer than other natural rubber wiper blades in harsh weather conditions
Easy to Separate and Install: Simply tear along the middle joint of the refill and two silicone blade strips will appear. Changing them is quick, easy, and saves you money in the long run
Crystal-Clear View: Watch water magically bead up and roll off your windshield while you drive, providing you with superior all-weather driving visibility, safety, and comfort
Customizable Fit: The silicone wiper refill measures 28 inches, and can be cut to your precise needs by simply lining it up with the old blade you removed. Strip height: 11 mm, width: 6mm

Universal Compatibility: The Silicone wiper blade refill is compatible with FRAMELESS BEAM WIPER BLADES on most cars buses, vans, lorries, trucks even boat. Make sure your car wipers are frameless to avoid inapplicability. Thank you

name: 4PCS Wiper Blade Refill, Universal Car Accessories, 22" Adjustable Size of Universal Replacement Windshield Wiper Refill Replacement for Front & Rear Windshield Wiper Baldes Rubber Strip (22Inch)
short_description: [High quality material] : These wiper blades are made of tough and soft rubber material, with all-weather, four seasons, high and low temperature resistance, durable, waterproof and rain proof, dust and corrosion resistance, easy to clean characteristics, long service life.

[Main function] : Use these windshield wipers to replace the original old/damaged wiper blade, can solve the phenomenon of windshield blur, can effectively scrape the water mist on the glass in rainy/snow days, do not leave water stains, so that the mirror is clearly visible, improve driving safety.

[Wide application] : This front/rear windshield wiper blade is soft material, size is 26 inches, can be cut, you can adjust the length to fit your wiper perfectly. Adjustability makes it suitable for most car models, please note that the rear wiper blade is suitable for boneless wipers, not suitable for iron wipers.

[All-weather use] : These rainx wiper blades are waterproof and rainproof treatment, can be used in any weather, the flat surface can be well scraped off the water mist, good working performance. Bendable features make it also easy to store and not easy to break, so you can use it at any time.

[Convenient installation] : These windshield wiper blades are easy to install and disassemble, you can complete the replacement in a short time, just need to take out the old, and then put the new in and cut off the long part, reseal and use. Use water to keep it wet before installation, which will make it a better fit for your wiper.
product_description: Specifications: Material: Rubber Size: 26 inches (65cm) Color: Black Installation location: car front windshield Suitable model: General purpose Function: - Please carefully check the shape and thickness of the wiper blade refill with your car wiper blade to ensure a good fit. - You will receive four pieces of this front/rear windshield wiper blade, which can meet your daily use and replacement needs, or make a nice gift for your loved ones and friends. Advantages of this silicone windshield wiper blades: The wiper refill is soft and provides waterproof protection for more peace of mind. These automotive replacement windshield wiper blades can be installed and removed quickly, providing a new easy-to-use wiper strip, effectively saving you time and money. Adjustable features, so these windshield wiper blades are suitable for most cars, trucks, trucks and other models. Installation steps of these replacement windshield wipers: 1. Use a blade/sharp object to remove the cover from one end of the wiper and save the cover. 2. Pull out the aging rubber strip and insert the new rubber strip. 3. Pull the rubber strip to the other end and cut off the long part with scissors. 4. Put the lid on and use it normally.
